soa_definicion_1.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ stændz fɔɹ ˈsɝvɪs ɔɹiɛntɪd ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚ

soa_definicion_2.texto: SOA focuses on designing software based on reusable services.
soa_definicion_2.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈfoʊkəsɪz ɑn dɪˈzaɪnɪŋ ˈsɔftwɛɹ beɪst ɑn ɹiˈjuzəbəl ˈsɝvɪsɪz

soa_principio_1.texto: A service is an independent functional unit.
soa_principio_1.fonetica: ə ˈsɝvɪs ɪz ən ˌɪndɪˈpɛndənt ˈfʌŋkʃənəl ˈjunɪt

soa_principio_2.texto: Services in SOA are autonomous and decoupled.
soa_principio_2.fonetica: ˈsɝvɪsɪz ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ ɑɹ ɔˈtɑnəməs ænd diˈkʌpəld

soa_principio_3.texto: SOA aims for interoperability between heterogeneous systems.
soa_principio_3.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ eɪmz fɔɹ ˌɪntɝˌɑpɝəˈbɪlɪti bɪˈtwin ˌhɛtɝəˈdʒiniəs ˈsɪstəmz

soa_beneficio_1.texto: It allows service reuse across multiple applications.
soa_beneficio_1.fonetica: ɪt əˈlaʊz ˈsɝvɪs ɹiˈjuːz əˈkrɔs ˈmʌltɪpəl ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃənz

soa_beneficio_2.texto: SOA simplifies integration of different systems.
soa_beneficio_2.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈsɪmplɪfaɪz ˌɪntɪˈɡɹeɪʃən əv ˈdɪfɝənt ˈsɪstəmz

soa_beneficio_3.texto: It improves scalability of enterprise applications.
soa_beneficio_3.fonetica: ɪt ɪmˈpɹuːvz ˌskeɪləˈbɪlɪti əv ˈɛntɝˌpɹaɪz ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃənz

soa_beneficio_4.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈkɹiːsɪz ˈbɪznəs ˌflɛksəˈbɪlɪti

soa_beneficio_5.texto: It reduces functionality duplication across systems.
soa_beneficio_5.fonetica: ɪt ɹɪˈduːsɪz ˌfʌŋkʃəˈnælɪti ˌduplɪˈkeɪʃən əˈkrɔs ˈsɪstəmz

soa_componente_1.texto: The service contract defines what a service does.
soa_componente_1.fonetica: ðə ˈsɝvɪs ˈkɑnˌtɹækt dɪˈfaɪnz wʌt ə ˈsɝvɪs dʌz

soa_componente_2.texto: The implementation contains the service's business logic.
soa_componente_2.fonetica: ðə ˌɪmplɪmɛnˈteɪʃən kənˈteɪnz ðə ˈsɝvɪsɪz ˈbɪznəs ˈlɑdʒɪk

soa_componente_3.texto: The consumer is the system that invokes the service.
soa_componente_3.fonetica: ðə kənˈsumɚ ɪz ðə ˈsɪstəm ðæt ɪnˈvoʊks ðə ˈsɝvɪs

soa_componente_4.texto: The provider exposes the service for use.
soa_componente_4.fonetica: ðə pɹəˈvaɪdɚ ɪkˈspoʊzɪz ðə ˈsɝvɪs fɔɹ juz

soa_estandar_1.texto: SOA relies on open standards like XML and SOAP.
soa_estandar_1.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈlaɪz ɑn ˈoʊpən ˈstændɚdz laɪk ɛks ɛm ɛl ænd soʊp

soa_estandar_2.texto: SOA protocols enable communication between services.
soa_estandar_2.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈpɹoʊtəˌkɑlz ɪˈneɪbəl kəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃən bɪˈtwin ˈsɝvɪsɪz

soa_practica_1.texto: SOA requires a service registry for dynamic discovery.
soa_practica_1.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈkwaɪɹz ə ˈsɝvɪs ˈɹɛdʒɪstɹi fɔɹ daɪˈnæmɪk dɪˈskʌvɚi

soa_practica_2.texto: The enterprise service bus connects multiple applications.
soa_practica_2.fonetica: ði ˈɛntɝˌpɹaɪz ˈsɝvɪs bʌs kəˈnɛkts ˈmʌltɪpəl ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃənz

soa_practica_3.texto: Services should be designed with loose coupling.
soa_practica_3.fonetica: ˈsɝvɪsɪz ʃʊd bi dɪˈzaɪnd wɪð lus ˈkʌplɪŋ

soa_practica_5.texto: SOA promotes service composition to create processes.
soa_practica_5.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ pɹəˈmoʊts ˈsɝvɪs ˌkɑmpəˈzɪʃən tu kɹiˈeɪt ˈpɹɑsɛsɪz

soa_practica_6.texto: Services should be autonomous and manageable.
soa_practica_6.fonetica: ˈsɝvɪsɪz ʃʊd bi ɔˈtɑnəməs ænd ˈmænɪdʒəbəl

soa_practica_7.texto: SOA encourages service and process governance.
soa_practica_7.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈkɝɪdʒɪz ˈsɝvɪs ænd ˈpɹɑsɛs ˈɡʌvɝnəns

soa_practica_8.texto: SOA monitoring allows measuring quality and performance.
soa_practica_8.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈmɑnɪtɚɪŋ əˈlaʊz ˈmɛʒɚɪŋ ˈkwɑlɪti ænd pɚˈfɔɹməns

soa_caso_1.texto: SOA is useful in large enterprises with legacy systems.
soa_caso_1.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪz ˈjusfəl ɪn lɑɹdʒ ˈɛntɝˌpɹaɪzɪz wɪð ˈlɛɡəsi ˈsɪstəmz

soa_caso_2.texto: It facilitates integration of new applications with legacy ones.
soa_caso_2.fonetica: ɪt fəˈsɪlɪteɪts ˌɪntɪˈɡɹeɪʃən əv nu ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃənz wɪð ˈlɛɡəsi wʌnz

soa_caso_3.texto: SOA enables different technologies to work together.
soa_caso_3.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪˈneɪbəlz ˈdɪfɝənt tɛkˈnɑlədʒiz tu wɝk təˈɡɛðɚ

soa_caso_4.texto: It's key in enterprise digital transformation projects.
soa_caso_4.fonetica: ɪts ki ɪn ˈɛntɝˌpɹaɪz ˈdɪdʒɪtl ˌtɹænsfɚˈmeɪʃən ˈpɹɑdʒɛkts

soa_caso_5.texto: SOA improves communication between distributed applications.
soa_caso_5.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪmˈpɹuːvz kəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃən bɪˈtwin dɪˈstɹɪbjətɪd ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃənz

soa_caso_6.texto: It helps with gradual migration of legacy systems.
soa_caso_6.fonetica: ɪt hɛlps wɪð ˈɡɹædʒuəl maɪˈɡɹeɪʃən əv ˈlɛɡəsi ˈsɪstəmz

soa_caso_7.texto: It allows connection of internal and external services.
soa_caso_7.fonetica: ɪt əˈlaʊz kəˈnɛkʃən əv ɪnˈtɝnəl ænd ɪkˈstɝnəl ˈsɝvɪsɪz

soa_caso_8.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ səˈpɔɹts ˈbɪznəs ˈpɹɑsɛs ˌɔɹkɪˈstɹeɪʃən

soa_caso_9.texto: SOA is commonly used in banking and telecommunications.
soa_caso_9.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪz ˈkɑmənli juzd ɪn ˈbæŋkɪŋ ænd ˌtɛləkəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃənz

soa_caso_10.texto: SOA facilitates modernization of legacy platforms.
soa_caso_10.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ fəˈsɪlɪteɪts ˌmɑdɚnɪˈzeɪʃən əv ˈlɛɡəsi ˈplætfɔɹmz

soa_caso_11.texto: It adapts well to hybrid architectures.
soa_caso_11.fonetica: ɪt əˈdæpts wɛl tu ˈhaɪbɹɪd ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚz

soa_caso_12.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ hɛlps ˈstændɚˌdaɪz ˈɛntɝˌpɹaɪz kəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃən

soa_caso_13.texto: It enables creating service catalogs for the organization.
soa_caso_13.fonetica: ɪt ɪˈneɪbəlz kɹiˈeɪtɪŋ ˈsɝvɪs ˈkætəlɔɡz fɔɹ ði ˌɔɹɡənɪˈzeɪʃən

soa_caso_14.texto: SOA is used in government systems.
soa_caso_14.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪz juzd ɪn ˈɡʌvɚnmənt ˈsɪstəmz

soa_caso_15.texto: It's useful for integrating external vendors and partners.
soa_caso_15.fonetica: ɪts ˈjusfəl fɔɹ ˈɪntəɡɹeɪtɪŋ ɪkˈstɝnəl ˈvɛndɚz ænd ˈpɑɹtnɚz

soa_caso_16.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ fəˈsɪlɪteɪts ˈwɝkfloʊ ˌɔtəˈmeɪʃən

soa_caso_17.texto: It enables integration of cloud applications.
soa_caso_17.fonetica: ɪt ɪˈneɪbəlz ˌɪntɪˈɡɹeɪʃən əv klaʊd ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃənz

soa_caso_18.texto: SOA is the foundation for modern microservices architectures.
soa_caso_18.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪz ðə faʊnˈdeɪʃən fɔɹ ˈmɑdɚn ˈmaɪkɹoʊˌsɝvɪsɪz ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚz

soa_caso_19.texto: It allows sharing services between departments.
soa_caso_19.fonetica: ɪt əˈlaʊz ˈʃɛɹɪŋ ˈsɝvɪsɪz bɪˈtwin dɪˈpɑɹtmənts

soa_caso_20.texto: SOA helps comply with interoperability regulations.
soa_caso_20.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ hɛlps kəmˈplaɪ wɪð ˌɪntɝˌɑpɝəˈbɪlɪti ˌɹɛɡjəˈleɪʃənz

soa_reto_1.texto: The main challenge in SOA is effective governance.
soa_reto_1.fonetica: ðə meɪn ˈtʃæləndʒ ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪz ɪˈfɛktɪv ˈɡʌvɝnəns

soa_reto_2.texto: One challenge is managing service versioning.
soa_reto_2.fonetica: wʌn ˈtʃæləndʒ ɪz ˈmænɪdʒɪŋ ˈsɝvɪs ˈvɝʒənɪŋ

soa_reto_3.texto: Security in SOA is critical due to service exposure.
soa_reto_3.fonetica: sɪˈkjʊɹɪti ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪz ˈkɹɪtɪkəl du tu ˈsɝvɪs ɪkˈspoʊʒɚ

soa_reto_4.texto: Performance can be affected by multiple invocations.
soa_reto_4.fonetica: pɚˈfɔɹməns kæn bi əˈfɛktɪd baɪ ˈmʌltɪpəl ˌɪnvəˈkeɪʃənz

soa_reto_5.texto: SOA requires constant monitoring to ensure quality.
soa_reto_5.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈkwaɪɹz ˈkɑnstənt ˈmɑnɪtɚɪŋ tu ɪnˈʃʊɹ ˈkwɑlɪti

soa_reto_6.texto: Network latency can affect user experience.
soa_reto_6.fonetica: ˈnɛtwɝk ˈleɪtənsi kæn əˈfɛkt ˈjuzɚ ɪkˈspɪɹiəns

soa_reto_7.texto: SOA involves greater complexity in architecture design.
soa_reto_7.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈvɑlvz ˈɡɹeɪtɚ kəmˈplɛksɪti ɪn ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚ dɪˈzaɪn

soa_reto_9.texto: A challenge is proper service documentation.
soa_reto_9.fonetica: ə ˈtʃæləndʒ ɪz ˈpɹɑpɚ ˈsɝvɪs ˌdɑkjəmɛnˈteɪʃən

soa_reto_10.texto: SOA requires robust service management tools.
soa_reto_10.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈkwaɪɹz ɹoʊˈbʌst ˈsɝvɪs ˈmænɪdʒmənt tulz

soa_reto_11.texto: Testing in SOA can be more complex than in monolithic systems.
soa_reto_11.fonetica: ˈtɛstɪŋ ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ kæn bi mɔɹ kəmˈplɛks ðæn ɪn ˌmɑnəˈlɪθɪk ˈsɪstəmz

soa_reto_12.texto: Managing dependencies between services is a key challenge.
soa_reto_12.fonetica: ˈmænɪdʒɪŋ dɪˈpɛndənsɪz bɪˈtwin ˈsɝvɪsɪz ɪz ə ki ˈtʃæləndʒ

soa_reto_13.texto: SOA can generate high initial infrastructure costs.
soa_reto_13.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ kæn ˈdʒɛnəɹeɪt haɪ ɪˈnɪʃəl ˈɪnfrəˌstrʌktʃɚ kɔsts

soa_reto_14.texto: Data consistency is difficult in SOA architectures.
soa_reto_14.fonetica: ˈdeɪtə kənˈsɪstənsi ɪz ˈdɪfɪkəlt ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚz

soa_reto_15.texto: SOA requires good versioning and deployment practices.
soa_reto_15.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈkwaɪɹz ɡʊd ˈvɝʒənɪŋ ænd dɪˈplɔɪmənt ˈpɹæktɪsɪz

soa_reto_16.texto: Real-time monitoring is fundamental in SOA.
soa_reto_16.fonetica: ˈɹiəl taɪm ˈmɑnɪtɚɪŋ ɪz ˌfʌndəˈmɛntəl ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ

soa_reto_17.texto: SOA needs clear security and privacy policies.
soa_reto_17.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ nidz klɪɹ sɪˈkjʊɹɪti ænd ˈpɹaɪvəsi ˈpɑləsiz

soa_reto_19.texto: SOA requires SLA monitoring to ensure agreements.
soa_reto_19.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈkwaɪɹz ɛs ɛl eɪ ˈmɑnɪtɚɪŋ tu ɪnˈʃʊɹ əˈɡɹimənts

soa_reto_21.texto: SOA involves cultural changes in software development.
soa_reto_21.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈvɑlvz ˈkʌltʃɝəl ˈtʃeɪndʒɪz ɪn ˈsɔftwɛɹ dɪˈvɛləpmənt

soa_reto_22.texto: Service auditing is essential for governance.
soa_reto_22.fonetica: ˈsɝvɪs ˈɔdɪtɪŋ ɪz ɪˈsɛnʃəl fɔɹ ˈɡʌvɝnəns

soa_reto_23.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ kæn ˌɪntɹəˈdus kəˌmjunɪˈkeɪʃən ˈoʊvɚˌhɛd

soa_reto_24.texto: Distributed monitoring is critical in SOA.
soa_reto_24.fonetica: dɪˈstɹɪbjətɪd ˈmɑnɪtɚɪŋ ɪz ˈkɹɪtɪkəl ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ

soa_reto_25.texto: SOA needs clear service discovery mechanisms.
soa_reto_25.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ nidz klɪɹ ˈsɝvɪs dɪˈskʌvɚi ˈmɛkəˌnɪzəmz

soa_reto_26.texto: Log management is important in SOA architectures.
soa_reto_26.fonetica: lɔɡ ˈmænɪdʒmənt ɪz ɪmˈpɔɹtənt ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚz

soa_reto_27.texto: SOA may require additional technical staff training.
soa_reto_27.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ meɪ ɹɪˈkwaɪɹ əˈdɪʃənəl ˈtɛknɪkəl stæf ˈtɹeɪnɪŋ

soa_reto_28.texto: Integration testing is key in SOA.
soa_reto_28.fonetica: ˌɪntɪˈɡɹeɪʃən ˈtɛstɪŋ ɪz ki ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ

soa_reto_29.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈkwaɪɹz wɛl ˈmeɪnˌteɪnd ˈsɝvɪs ˈkætəlɔɡz

soa_reto_30.texto: Transaction monitoring is necessary in SOA.
soa_reto_30.fonetica: tɹænˈzækʃən ˈmɑnɪtɚɪŋ ɪz ˈnɛsəˌsɛɹi ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ

soa_practica_9.texto: Designing clear contracts is fundamental in SOA.
soa_practica_9.fonetica: dɪˈzaɪnɪŋ klɪɹ ˈkɑnˌtɹækts ɪz ˌfʌndəˈmɛntəl ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ

soa_practica_10.texto: SOA relies on messaging standards like JMS.
soa_practica_10.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈlaɪz ɑn ˈmɛsɪdʒɪŋ ˈstændɚdz laɪk dʒeɪ ɛm ɛs

soa_practica_12.texto: SOA encourages service reuse across the organization.
soa_practica_12.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈkɝɪdʒɪz ˈsɝvɪs ɹiˈjuːz əˈkrɔs ði ˌɔɹɡənɪˈzeɪʃən

soa_practica_13.texto: Data governance is essential in SOA environments.
soa_practica_13.fonetica: ˈdeɪtə ˈɡʌvɝnəns ɪz ɪˈsɛnʃəl ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈvaɪɹənmənts

soa_practica_14.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈkwaɪɹz ˈkɑnˌtɹækt ˈvɝʒənɪŋ ˈpɑləsiz

soa_practica_15.texto: Role-based security is common in SOA.
soa_practica_15.fonetica: ɹoʊl beɪst sɪˈkjʊɹɪti ɪz ˈkɑmən ɪn ɛs oʊ eɪ

soa_practica_16.texto: SOA allows implementing regression tests on services.
soa_practica_16.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ əˈlaʊz ˈɪmplɪmɛntɪŋ ɹɪˈɡɹɛʃən tɛsts ɑn ˈsɝvɪsɪz

soa_modernidad_1.texto: SOA lays the foundation for hybrid architectures.
soa_modernidad_1.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ leɪz ðə faʊnˈdeɪʃən fɔɹ ˈhaɪbɹɪd ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚz

soa_modernidad_2.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈkɑnˌtɹækts ɪnˈspaɪɹ ˈmɑdɚn eɪ pi aɪz

soa_modernidad_3.texto: The SOA philosophy lives on in cloud computing.
soa_modernidad_3.fonetica: ðə ɛs oʊ eɪ fɪˈlɑsəfi lɪvz ɑn ɪn klaʊd kəmˈpjutɪŋ

soa_modernidad_4.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪz lus ˈkʌplɪŋ ɡaɪdz ˈmaɪkɹoʊˌsɝvɪsɪz

soa_modernidad_5.texto: SOA demonstrates the need for standardization.
soa_modernidad_5.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈdɛmənstɹeɪts ðə nid fɔɹ ˌstændɚdəˈzeɪʃən

soa_modernidad_6.texto: SOA learnings help design resilient systems.
soa_modernidad_6.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈlɝnɪŋz hɛlp dɪˈzaɪn ɹɪˈzɪljənt ˈsɪstəmz

soa_modernidad_7.texto: SOA brings clarity to service management.
soa_modernidad_7.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ bɹɪŋz ˈklɛɹɪti tu ˈsɝvɪs ˈmænɪdʒmənt

soa_modernidad_8.texto: Distributed monitoring stems from SOA principles.
soa_modernidad_8.fonetica: dɪˈstɹɪbjətɪd ˈmɑnɪtɚɪŋ stɛmz fɹʌm ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈpɹɪnsəpəlz

soa_modernidad_9.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈspaɪɹz ˈdɪdʒɪtl ˈsɝvɪs ˈkætəlɔɡz

soa_modernidad_10.texto: Cloud elasticity builds on SOA principles.
soa_modernidad_10.fonetica: klaʊd ɪlæˈstɪsɪti bɪldz ɑn ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈpɹɪnsəpəlz

soa_modernidad_11.texto: SOA encourages self-service in digital enterprises.
soa_modernidad_11.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈkɝɪdʒɪz sɛlf ˈsɝvɪs ɪn ˈdɪdʒɪtl ˈɛntɝˌpɹaɪzɪz

soa_modernidad_12.texto: The SOA vision reflects in modern marketplaces.
soa_modernidad_12.fonetica: ðə ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈvɪʒən ɹɪˈflɛkts ɪn ˈmɑdɚn ˈmɑɹkɪtˌpleɪsɪz

soa_modernidad_13.texto: SOA paves the way for the API economy.
soa_modernidad_13.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ peɪvz ðə weɪ fɔɹ ði eɪ pi aɪ ɪˈkɑnəmi

soa_modernidad_14.texto: SOA modularity fits with serverless architectures.
soa_modernidad_14.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˌmɑdʒəˈlɛɹɪti fɪts wɪð ˈsɝvɚləs ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚz

soa_modernidad_15.texto: SOA principles are used in IoT integrations.
soa_modernidad_15.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈpɹɪnsəpəlz ɑɹ juzd ɪn aɪ oʊ ti ˌɪntɪˈɡɹeɪʃənz

soa_modernidad_16.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈspaɪɹz ˈmɑdɚn əbˌzɝvəˈbɪlɪti ˈpɹæktɪsɪz

soa_modernidad_17.texto: SOA flexibility remains in modern architectures.
soa_modernidad_17.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˌflɛksəˈbɪlɪti ɹɪˈmeɪnz ɪn ˈmɑdɚn ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚz

soa_modernidad_18.texto: SOA teaches the importance of decoupling layers.
soa_modernidad_18.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈtitʃɪz ði ɪmˈpɔɹtəns əv diˈkʌplɪŋ ˈleɪɚz

soa_modernidad_19.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ hɛlps dɪˈzaɪn ɹɪˈzɪljənt ˈplætfɔɹmz

soa_modernidad_20.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˌɔɹkɪˈstɹeɪʃən pɹɪˈsidz kuˈbɝnətiz

soa_modernidad_21.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈɪnfluənsɪz ˈblɑktʃeɪn ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚ

soa_modernidad_22.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈkɑnˌtɹækts ɡaɪd ˌɪntɝˌɑpɝəˈbɪlɪti əˈɡɹimənts

soa_modernidad_23.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɪnˈspaɪɹz ˈoʊpən kəˈlæbəɹətɪv ˈɛkoʊˌsɪstəmz

soa_modernidad_24.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈzɪljəns ɡaɪdz ˈkɹɪtɪkəl ˈɑɹkɪtɛktʃɚz

soa_modernidad_25.texto: SOA remains relevant in digital banking and insurance.
soa_modernidad_25.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ɹɪˈmeɪnz ˈɹɛləvənt ɪn ˈdɪdʒɪtl ˈbæŋkɪŋ ænd ɪnˈʃʊɹəns

soa_modernidad_26.texto: SOA learning is vital in regulated industries.
soa_modernidad_26.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈlɝnɪŋ ɪz ˈvaɪtəl ɪn ˈɹɛɡjəˌleɪtɪd ˈɪndəstɹiz

soa_modernidad_27.texto: SOA drives adoption of data strategies.
soa_modernidad_27.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ dɹaɪvz əˈdɑpʃən əv ˈdeɪtə ˈstɹætədʒiz

soa_modernidad_28.texto: SOA provides experience for managing multi-cloud environments.
soa_modernidad_28.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ pɹəˈvaɪdz ɪkˈspɪɹiəns fɔɹ ˈmænɪdʒɪŋ ˈmʌlti klaʊd ɪnˈvaɪɹənmənts

soa_modernidad_29.texto: SOA teaches how to design scalable solutions.
soa_modernidad_29.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈtitʃɪz haʊ tu dɪˈzaɪn ˈskeɪləbəl səˈluʃənz

soa_modernidad_30.fonetica: ɛs oʊ eɪ ˈdɪsəplɪn ʃeɪps ˈmɑdɚn ˈɑɹkɪtɛkts
